Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
Managers.ActorManager
Managers.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends ActorManager
Manages collision detection and response between different game actors (friendly units, enemy units, projectiles). Inherits from `ActorManager` to access shared actor lists. Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionManager

      public CollisionManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Constructs a new `CollisionManager`.
      Parameters:
      root - The root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The screen width for managing actor positions.

  • Method Details

    • getCollisionManager

      public static CollisionManager getCollisionManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of `CollisionManager`.
      Parameters:
      root - The root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The screen width for managing actor positions.
      Returns:
      The `CollisionManager` instance.

    • UpdateCollisionManager

      protected void UpdateCollisionManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Updates the `CollisionManager` instance with a new root and screen width.
      Parameters:
      root - The new root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The new screen width for managing actor positions.

    • generateEnemyFire

      public void generateEnemyFire()
      Generates fire from enemy units (e.g., bullets or projectiles).

    • spawnEnemyProjectile

      private void spawnEnemyProjectile(ActiveActorDestructible projectile)
      Spawns an enemy projectile and adds it to the game.
      Parameters:
      projectile - The `ActiveActorDestructible` instance representing the projectile.

    • handleCollisions

      public void handleCollisions()
      Handles all collisions between friendly and enemy units, projectiles, and checks for penetration through defenses.

    • handleCollisionsBetween

      private void handleCollisionsBetween(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors1, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors2)
      Checks for collisions between two lists of actors and responds by causing damage to both.
      Parameters:
      actors1 - The first list of `ActiveActorDestructible` actors.
      actors2 - The second list of `ActiveActorDestructible` actors.

    • handleEnemyPenetration

      private void handleEnemyPenetration()
      Handles the scenario where enemies penetrate the user's defenses.

    • enemyHasPenetratedDefenses

      private boolean enemyHasPenetratedDefenses(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Checks if an enemy has penetrated the user's defenses based on its position.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The `ActiveActorDestructible` instance representing the enemy.
      Returns:
      `true` if the enemy has penetrated, otherwise `false`.
